images.caption: Figure 2:Task-arithmetic interpolation between a bbox-specialized and an OCR-specialized checkpoint.
Figure 3:Complex table. Left: Original image. Right: Rendered transcription. Generated with LightOnOCR-2-1B.
Figure 4:Example of bounding box generating models. Left: Original image. Right: Rendered transcription, with image crop corresponding to generated bounding box. Generated with LightOnOCR-2-1B-bbox.
Figure 5:LightOnOCR-2-1B models excel at transcription of scientific documents. Left: Original image. Right: Rendered transcription. Generated with LightOnOCR-2-1B.
Figure 6:Example of transcription outside of distribution. Left: Original image. Right: Rendered transcription. Generated with LightOnOCR-2-1B.

Figure 7:LightOnOCR-2-1B models were trained with a large portion of scanned documents which translates to improved performance on those types of files compared to v1.
Left: Original image. Right: Rendered transcription. Generated with LightOnOCR-2-1B.
Source: August Lustig, Sämtliche Werke – Zweiter Band (1909), p. 214–215. Wikimedia Commons, “ALustig_SämtlicheWerke_ZweiterBand_page214_215.pdf”, Public Domain (PDM 1.0)
